name: Lost Swan Hatch
description:
First off, shout out to u/failsafe for the initial 3D model: https://3dwarehouse.sketchup.com/model/d31ff5248c0a47838a8e7711b882cbf4/The-Swan...

I recently rewatched Lost and loved it. I thought it would be fun to make a game of the Swan hatch from the show where the player has to enter the numbers etc.

4 8 15 16 23 42

This is a work in progress and I hope to add to it over time. Any and all feedback welcome.

Namaste!
